description: Create column ``Match`` by appending `Ebook Central::` to the front of ``ID``

jython:import sys
sys.path.append(r'C:\jython2.7.2\Lib\site-packages')

description: In rows with no values in ``Match``, replace pairs of initials seperated by a space with pairs of initials not seperated by a space
In rows with no value in ``Match``, replace ISBD colons in ``Title`` with standard colons

Create column ``Title Only 2`` by changing value of value of ``Title Only 1`` to titlecase, with spaces trimmed, hyphens replaced with spaces, and backslashes (/) and ending periods removed
Create column ``Title 3`` based on value of ``Title 2`` without periods, commas, and ampersands
Create column ``Title Only 3`` based on value of ``Title Only 2`` without periods, commas, and ampersands
Change ``Title 1`` values to the value in ``Record Number`` for the Aleph records where that value is either the complete title or the title without the subtitle
If the value in ``Title 1`` isn't an Ebook Central ID mismatch, update blank cells in column ``Match`` to the value in ``Title 1``
